Room.Name: Kafkan Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Kafkan Way, south of the Riverdell Tranquility Park.
Room.LongDescription: The Park facilities are open all day and night for the benefit of all the citizens of the city, knowing that not everyone quits when the sun goes down. The entrance to the large facility is located on the west side of the Park off of Leviathan Drive. Kafkan road continues to the east and west from here, heading west towards the Necropolis.
